name: Cookie
overview: An unofficial homebrew clone of the 1983 Ultimate - Play the Game (Now better known as RARE) Sinclair ZX Spectrum game Cookie. Developed by Andy Noble in 2017. Description from the original: In the game Charlie the Chef has to bake a cake, but the ingredients (Mixed Peel, Chunky Chocolate, Crafty Cheese, Sneaky Sugar and Colonel Custard) are reluctant. To bake the cake Charile have to mix ten ingredients in the cake but a whole lot of other things (nuts, bolts, screws) flies around and end up in the mix as well and spoil the cake. So Charlie have to watch out what and what not to but in the mix. Every time a non-eatable item is mixed in Charlie have to but in an extra eatable item.
